name: The TimePiece
description:
Use the mysterious timepiece to repair the castle to its former glory!

In this puzzle game, the player can manipulate time using the timepiece to go to the past or the future. In the future the castle is broken down and unstable, while in the past the castle is lively and new.

Credits
